outlineHoverColorDesc: Text color when hovering over outline items
outlineHighlightBgColorDesc: Background color for current selected/highlighted items
demoAddConfigTip: üí° Tip: Add {featureName}.json in demos folder for detailed demo
featureDesc_aiAssistant: All-in-one AI assistant for SiYuan, supporting ChatGPT / Gemini login and conversations.
featureDesc_aiOutline: Provide a live outline sidebar for AI assistant conversations to quickly browse and locate key points.
featureDesc_promptManager: Manage AI prompts as reusable presets with categories, search and one-click insertion.
featureDesc_aiQuestionHelper: Add an "Ask AI" toolbar button to send the current content to AI with one click.
featureDesc_docTreeStyle: Provide multiple beautiful visual themes for the document tree, such as glass, paper and tech styles.
featureDesc_headingStyle: Apply carefully designed visual styles to headings to improve readability of the hierarchy.
featureDesc_tagSearch: Rebuild tag search experience with faster querying and better result presentation.
featureDesc_codeBlockFolding: Enhanced code block: record fold state and block name.
featureDesc_linkIcon: Automatically append icons to links, doc references, and doc links for quicker visual scanning.
featureDesc_headingEnhancer: Auto create a new heading when pressing Enter on a collapsed heading.
featureDesc_batchFold: Batch fold or expand headings and blocks.
featureDesc_AutoCollapse: Automatically collapse headings and blocks based on rules.
featureDesc_toolbarEnhancer: Enhanced editor toolbar: quick type change, color, table, super block, and more.
featureDesc_batchEdit: Batch edit multiple blocks: remove format, set color/background, bold/italic, merge blocks, etc.
featureDesc_recentColorButton: Quickly apply recently used text color and background.
featureDesc_outlineEnhancer: Enhance the outline panel, including batch heading level operations.
featureDesc_outlineSearch: Add a search box to the outline panel to quickly locate headings.
featureDesc_outlineInsert: Insert outline headings and subdocument lists into the current document.
featureDesc_outlineFoldSync: Sync fold state between outline panel and document headings.
featureDesc_listIndexCorrector: Automatically correct list block numbering/index when editing.
featureDesc_listConvert: Press Tab twice in a sub-list to convert it to a normal paragraph.
featureDesc_paragraphToListFix: Fix issues when converting paragraphs to lists in SiYuan.
featureDesc_listPaste: Remove duplicate numbering when pasting content into an empty list.
featureDesc_breadcrumbScroll: Optimize breadcrumb scroll behavior for better navigation.
featureDesc_middleClickScrollToOuter: Use middle-click to scroll and jump to the outer container block.
featureDesc_imageCopy: Add a one-click copy button for images.
featureDesc_recentDocsButton: Add a "Recent Docs" button to the top-left area for quick access.
featureDesc_backgroundCover: Customize the home page slideshow background with presets, blur and overlay controls.
featureDesc_slideshowMode: Enable a presentation-like reading mode that snaps scrolling to screen height and provides a toolbar toggle.
featureDesc_autoExpandFoldedHeadings: Auto expand collapsed headings, blocks, lists and paragraphs in focus mode.
featureDesc_outlineAutoExpand: Auto expand headings and lists after clicking items in the outline while in focus mode.
featureDesc_menuOptimization: Promote important sub-menus such as "Turn Into" to the top level of the block menu.
featureDesc_menuListManager: Control which block menu items are visible or hidden for a cleaner menu.
featureDesc_cssOptimization: Optimize SiYuan built-in CSS to significantly improve rendering performance.
featureDesc_codeBlockAutoDetect: Automatically detect programming language and set the code block language.
featureDesc_titleOptimizer: Document formatting: remove irregular heading numbers and fix heading level structure.
featureDesc_listIndent: Improve list indentation behavior and indent list block content precisely.
featureDesc_netImgLocalizer: Save remote images and resources locally in SiYuan's workspace.
featureDesc_historyManager: Provide a new history view and convenient restore operations.
featureDesc_inboxCollector: Automatically detect inbox documents and move notes into the specified folder on a schedule.
featureDesc_CopyAsBlockRef: Improve block reference copying experience and support quick block ref usage.
featureDesc_blockRefClickBehavior: Standardize open behavior for ref blocks and embed blocks when clicking.
featureDesc_embedBlockEnhancer: Rebuild embed block and backlink panel for a clearer reading experience.
featureDesc_docTreeEnhancer: Show subdocument count and tag information in the document tree.
featureDesc_docTreeTagManager: Manage tag colors, sort order and display categories in the document tree.
featureDesc_docTreePreviewCard: Show document summary and key points on hover in the document tree.
featureDesc_normalTagEnhancer: Add quick delete and other enhancements for inline tags.
featureDesc_relatedPersonTagButton: Provide a dedicated "Related Person" tag button and exclude it from default tag search.
featureDesc_inspirationMargin: Add a powerful side-margin note system and auto-detect invalid linked blocks.
featureDesc_docSearch: Use Ctrl+F to search and highlight in the current document with navigation and global search integration.
featureDesc_searchOptimization: Optimize the global search dialog: better keyboard behavior, grouped headings, numbered results and clickable tags.
featureDesc_batchMove: Batch move search results or selected documents to a specified target document.
featureDesc_autoLinkTitle: Automatically fetch and fill in link titles, with special handling for WeChat articles.
featureDesc_wechatQRCode: Automatically detect WeChat links and generate QR codes for scanning on mobile.
featureDesc_silentAIHelper: Silently call AI to analyze and tag documents in the background.
featureDesc_pasteConformMode: Automatically normalize AI chat content into a format better suited for SiYuan.
featureDesc_headingNumbering: Automatically add numbers to headings with multiple formats and display options.
featureDesc_bulletThreading: Configure bullet line, list marker color and list visual style (only affects list markers).
featureDesc_tagSearchInterceptor: Accelerate tag search performance and reduce lag.
featureDesc_docTreeShiftSelect: Hold Shift and click to batch select documents in the document tree.
featureDesc_multiBlockEmbed: Automatically generate SQL query when copying multiple blocks as embed blocks.
featureDesc_docTreeBatchMove: Batch move documents and subdocuments directly in the document tree.
featureDesc_fontSettings: Configure font family, line height and related typography for headings and numbering.
featureDesc_codeBlockStyle: Choose visual style and color scheme for code blocks.
featureDesc_tableStyle: Apply visual theme styles to standard tables.
featureDesc_multiDimTableStyle: Apply theme styles to attribute-view tables (multi-dimensional tables).
featureDesc_docTreeStyle_full: Provide multiple visual themes for the document tree (enhanced style configuration).
featureDesc_headingStyle_full: Apply beautiful visual styles to headings and fine-tune hierarchy readability.
featureDesc_skinStyle: Switch overall shell skin including toolbar, tab bar, dock and breadcrumb.
headingNumbering_outlineModeHelp:
No numbering: do not show numbers in the outline
Inherit Style: use the same numbering style as headings but not colors
Inherit Style + Color: use both the same numbering style and colors as headings
Standard: use an independent outline numbering style (outer 1.2.3, inner 1.1 1.2 1.3)
aiAssistant_defaultPageDesc: This page loads by default when opening the AI assistant panel.
aiAssistant_shortcutDesc: Choose which quick channel buttons show in the panel.
aiAssistant_promptButtonDesc: Adjust the floating prompt button in the dock panel to avoid covering the input box.
aiAssistant_promptButtonNote: Default: bottom 80px, right 16px. Adjust if the button overlaps the input box.
aiOutline_widthDesc: Set the AI outline panel width. Range: 200-600px, default: 280px.
promptManager_quickButtonsDesc: When enabled, clicking inserts document content and copies the prompt. Click the title to expand or collapse the editor.
promptManager_contentLabel: Prompt content (use {{content}} to insert document text)
promptManager_insertVarNote: Insert the variable at the cursor; document content replaces it when used.
silentAIHelper_smartSelectionDesc: The system uses Gemini by default and alerts you if it seems unreachable. Switch services manually when needed.
membershipPlanFreeDesc: Enjoy essential editor, outline, and list helpers so SiYuan stays smooth every day.
membershipPlanVipDesc: Unlock advanced productivity and the full visual theme suite for a highly personalized workspace.
membershipPlanSvipDesc: Includes everything in VIP plus baseline AI services for smarter tags, semantic understanding, and knowledge-graph building.
membershipPlanSsvipDesc: Three-year bundle with every feature plus AI foundations for tagging, semantic analysis, and graph building.
membershipPlanAiTokenNote: AI tokens billed per actual usage
configFieldLabel_listExpandLevel: List Block Heading Insert Outline Level
docTreeTag_desc_categoryDisplay: Select which tag categories to display in document tree (select all = show all tags)
docTreeTag_desc_usage:
‚Ä¢ Select all categories = Show all tags (no filter)
‚Ä¢ Select some categories = Show tags of selected categories only
‚Ä¢ Uncategorized tags are always shown
docTreeTag_desc_color: Customize tag category colors in document tree (select from 10 preset colors)
docTreeTag_desc_sort: Customize display order of tag categories in document tree (smaller number = higher priority)
docTreeTag_desc_tip:
‚Ä¢ Color and sort order changes take effect immediately
‚Ä¢ Clear document tree tag cache in "Clear Cache" to refresh display
slideshowMode_mode_page_desc: Scroll by full pages while keeping the first-screen background, suitable for presentation/reading.
slideshowMode_mode_edit_desc: Scroll naturally while keeping the background fixed on the first screen, suitable for writing and annotation.
listStyle_desc_background: Control background and marker colors for folded list items.
listStyle_desc_fontColor: Control the color of ordered list numbers, leave empty to use theme default color.
listStyle_desc_bulletThreading: Turn off to disable list bullet threading lines and active path highlight.
listStyle_desc_lineWidth: Only affects the thickness of guide lines (ancestor path); recommended 1‚Äì2 px to avoid being too visually heavy.
listStyle_desc_lineColor: Leave empty to follow theme primary color, or pick a custom color.
listStyle_desc_activeMarker: Background and shape of markers on the active list path.
listStyle_desc_bulletThreadingDisabled: Bullet Threading is disabled. Enable it to adjust line width, color, and marker appearance.
listStyle_desc_markerOnly: All settings only affect the list marker area (numbers/dots), not the entire text line background.
listStyle_desc_numbering: Configure numbering style for each level of ordered lists, leave empty to use system default.
fontSettings_fontFamilyDesc: Choose the font for heading numbering; leave empty to use the system default
fontSettings_lineHeightNote: The numbering font size follows the heading size (H1/H2/H3 etc.), no separate setting needed
fontSettings_listContentIndentDesc: Indent list content except the first (index) line; default 7px
headingStyle_desc: Control the top/bottom margin, size, letter spacing and style for each heading level. Leave empty to use the theme default (px or em). Note: margins apply only to expanded headings.
bg_rotation_desc_enabled: A preset from the library will auto-apply within the random interval
bg_rotation_desc_disabled: Save at least one preset to enable random rotation
bg_empty_presets_desc: Adjust image & settings in "Choose Background", then click "Save to Library" below to reuse quickly.
bg_tab_library_desc: Apply saved combinations in one click
bg_rotation_subtitle: Apply a library preset at intervals
bg_online_refresh_desc: Each click fetches and switches the image
bg_online_custom_desc: Use this URL directly (recommend 1920x1080 or above)
bg_title_depth_desc: Adjust title shadow/depth for clearer cover
bg_overlay_desc: Add a soft mask for dark themes to reduce glare
bg_overlay_note: For dark themes, enabling cover blends the background with UI better.
bg_contrast_desc: Control title/body text to avoid dark-on-dark or light-on-light
bg_contrast_body_desc: Inherit title or choose an independent mode
bg_contrast_body_hint: Currently inheriting title colors. Switch mode to customize.
bg_save_edit_desc: Overwrite the current preset image and settings
bg_save_name_placeholder: Name this background, e.g. Morning Gradient
skinStyle_option_system_desc: Use SiYuan's system default style without applying any skin
skinStyle_option_default_desc: Sugar: soft pink shell with red accents
skinStyle_option_appleDark_desc: macOS-style dark: graphite background, high-contrast text, blue accent
skinStyle_option_forestMist_desc: Cool green primary, misty gray background; comfortable for long reading
membershipAgreementItem1Desc: After purchase you get all features in the selected plan; membership is billed annually and takes effect from the purchase date.
membershipAgreementItem2Desc: You may request a refund within 7 days of purchase; afterwards refunds are unavailable. Any refund is prorated by remaining days.
membershipAgreementItem3Desc: AI-related token fees are billed separately based on actual usage and are not included in plan pricing.
membershipAgreementItem4Desc: We keep your data private and never disclose it to third parties; all information is used solely to deliver the service.
membershipAgreementItem5Desc: We may adjust service content when necessary, but existing members will keep their purchased benefits.
membershipPaymentBack: Back to choose a payment method
membershipPaymentInfo: Please scan the QR code above with WeChat to finish payment.
membershipPaymentNotice:
User notice:
The plugin currently supports the stable version: SiYuan v3.5.0 (Download from the official site). New SiYuan releases may introduce plugin conflicts, and each plugin update requires hundreds of tests, so unless a major version with important features needs support, compatibility updates will not be provided. Thank you for understanding! For product features and usage tutorials, please visit: https://zhongcaodaren.feishu.cn/docx/TcaXddhNbozq3JxZF2gc5LEQnJc
membershipPaymentConfirm: I have paid (tap after payment to get the activation code)
membershipPaymentRefundNote: *Note: This is a virtual/digital product. No refunds after purchase‚Äîplease confirm before paying.
membershipPaymentSuccessCta: Scan to contact support or join the member group
membershipPaymentSuccessTip: If the QR code is not visible, please reach out to support
membershipPaymentImportantContent: When adding support on WeChat, include your SiYuan ID: {id}; requests without matching payments will be declined.
membershipActivatePlaceholder: Enter the activation code you received after purchase
membershipActivateInputEmpty: Please fill in your SiYuan ID and activation code
membershipActivateInvalid: Please check your SiYuan ID/activation code
membershipTrialActive: Trial is active; advanced features turn off when it ends
membershipTrialExpired: Trial has ended; advanced/theme/AI features are turned off
batchEdit_transparentLocked: Transparent color cannot be modified, this is a special color used to restore background
